St._Paul.Lexington Parkway (Metro Transit station: Lexington Parkway is a light rail station along the METRO Green Line in Saint Paul, Minnesota. It is located along University Avenue on both sides of the intersection with Lexington Parkway. The station has split side platforms, with the westbound platform on the north side of the tracks west of Lexington and the eastbound platform on the south side of the tracks east of the intersection.
